page.title: 07PREPARATORY SCHOOL EDUCATION
page.content: My day starts unpleasantly - a bell wakes us up at 7.10.When we have washed all together downstairs we say our morning prayers and have breakfast.After a short Assembly we have 5 classes,broken by a morning break when we have a drink,receive our letters or see our Playroom Master on discipline matters! Several days a week we have games in the afternoon when we can make use of our lovely new Sports Hall but on non-games days we go back to class for 3 more lessons after lunch.During the lunchbreak we have been able to follow our hobbies like Shooting, Archery ,Computers,Art, Chess,Carpentry and many others.We don't have an afternoon tea so our next food is at 6.00 when we have a cooked meal.Most evenings we have Studies (homework!) but we still have time to play outside.
